website_summaries.verdict: A width of only 32 inches makes this acacia table an ideal design for small and narrow outdoor spaces.
pros: Well crafted and sturdy with 3-inch thick tabletop
Acacia wood has a teak finish
matching benches are available for separate purchase
cons: The table doesn’t have a center hole for an umbrella base

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is Fantastic! Fast shipping. I just finished assembling this and it was extremely easy. The quality is outstanding for the price. All screws and holes lined up and 1each of hardware extra was included. Again I wasn’t sure what to expect for the price but we are so happy with it we are ordering another one. This company is doing a great job and hope as they grow they don’t lose the quality. We are going to use teak oil on it to preserve and enhance the wood but honestly it doesn’t really need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it. It's the perfect size for our small ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this table was so cheap! I LOVE it. It's the perfect size for our small deck and it looks expensive. It's heavy and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: leah johston

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! I bought 2 and put them together ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I bought 2 and put them together to make a long outdoor table and they look great together! Easy to assemble & seem like good quality & solid + real wood
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table! I can’t believe it was only $200
customer_reviews.text: Amazing table! I can’t believe it was only $200!! Get so many compliments on this incredible addition to the back deck. Holds up great in SoCal without a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D

customer_reviews.title: Factory did not drill holes properly, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this product. NONE of the holes for the connector bar underneath were drilled correctly for the bolts. I still went ahead and used the screws, and it feels stable at the moment... however, I doubt this will last long term. Don’t buy it - I couldn’t fix the warehouse’s mistake and I’m sure my product was not the only one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mfm05

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up well outdoors
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this table since the beginning of June. I am very disappointed even though I love the appearance of the table. I followed placement instructions as best we can. It is not in direct sunlight for long periods of time (shady area behind house, with umbrella) and I have it covered with a vinyl tablecloth with the elastic edges to hold it on so the elements don't get to it. But it is supposed to be an outdoor table. I took the tablecloth off and the wood is very very dry, it is actually warped in places as well as cracking. I doubt the table will make the summer. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wortham

customer_reviews.title: This is a very heavy sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it, including the price.I've gotten so many compliments, people think I must have paid alot..when I tell them it was 200.00 they don't believe it..I gave it a coat of teak oil and the water just beads upon it.. love it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a new indoor dining table. I absolutely love it! It’s sturdy, great quality and looks way more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood table
customer_reviews.text: This table completes my outdoor dining set. I love the wood look and size of the table. It’s large enough for a family gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but smallish
customer_reviews.text: nice quality table but quite diminutive. the picture makes it look larger. Can seat 4 ok but any more than that will be a squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: MsNomer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not made for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This says it's an outdoor table, but after one season of use, in NY is a quick season, the table is already warped, the wood is cracking. It was a waste of money. If you're going to use the table inside, i think it's beautiful and a good value for the money. Don't waste your money for outdoor use not under a covered porch.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy table, with minor assembly challenges
customer_reviews.text: While the assembly took a bit longer then I anticipated, due to several bolts used to install the table bracket, it was worth the extra time. The table is sturdy and looks great. I did have some trouble where the bracket holes didn’t exactly line up, but with a little finesse the bolt eventually went in the base. I would still recommend this table even with some minor assembly challenges. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wacht

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is Beautiful! We drilled a hole for our umbrella. Do NOT drill the hole in the center and I do not recommend anyone do this unless they are handy & experienced or you will ruin the table. Also take painters tape around the area penciled off to drill to avoid cracking. Otherwise I suggest leave as is if you can live without an umbrella. We get full sun on our patio and wouldn't be able to sit outside without one.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Damaged already!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table a year ago. It was a little bit of challenge to put it together, but we did it. It was beautiful, sturdy, perfect size for our backyard. I even made a vinyl cover for the top, so the elements won't damage it. That being said, not even a year later, the top planks are drying and separating. Couple of planks actually are damaged: peeling a layer of wood, cracked, period: unsightly. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED!! So unless you plan to use it indoors, or in a "bubble" outside, don't buy it...
customer_reviews.author: OCTAVIAN FRANCU

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this table, great craftsmanship. I have white wicker chairs. I painted the legs white before I assembled it. Assembly was easy..need 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: S. T. Bibee

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This table is so wonderful for the money! The top is very nice, details are present. If I needed an indoor table, I'd consider this one, except for the grooves on top. Legs are simple and very sturdy. My teen and I put this together in a couple hours. Mine is on my covered patio, but does get direct afternoon sun. I've only had it a few months, and so far I'm just using Old English oil to spruce it up.
customer_reviews.author: Prime member

customer_reviews.title: Already warping after six weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table last fall and didn’t get around to setting it up until about 6 weeks ago. I’m disappointed that its already warping. Some pieces are bending in, and others are bending out. One of the larger boards looks like it may crack by the end of the summer. I contacted Amazon’s customer service and they directed me to lodge a complaint with the manufacturer. Now I’m waiting to hear back, and don’t appreciate the hassle. It’s an attractive table and it’s functional for now, but if it continues to warp at this speed it won’t make it past the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Owens

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up well outdoors for a year
customer_reviews.text: This table is solid and looked nice at first, but in a few months the corners started to come apart (mostly cosmetic) and now after a year outdoors both the table and benches look terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table - well made and high quality but length is 60in not what the desc says
customer_reviews.text: This table is very nice, and much larger than the description says. It is actually 5ft long, and cleverly folds in 2 with hidden hinges making it very easy to store carry or move. The wood quality is excellent, and the workmanship is much better than I expected. Using this large table as a computer work area and its totally perfect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous table we originally bought it for patio but ended up keeping it as a dining table, we also got matching bench and bought a custom cushion for it it's gorgeous together, would recommend, we put clear plastic over the table because crumbs keep falling through the table spaces.
customer_reviews.author: LISA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table Intelligent Design
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was very impressed with the design of this table. All hardware is coated and should be water/rust resistant for years to come. Once fully assembled, table is sturdy. The wood has a nice teak stain finish as well as some type of poly clear coat. My intent is to use this as an outdoor workbench type table next to my garage. As such, even the best clear coat finishes will degrade over time. When the time comes my intent is to belt sand the table reapply stain and poly coat. I anticipate this table will serve for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for about two weeks now and it’s great. Seats four very comfortably and could squeeze six without much trouble. Looks like it cost much more than it does. In spite of some reviewers, it’s quite easy to assemble. I did it in less than half an hour. Some have said that the holes don’t match up, I had the same problem at first; but I figured out that they were just putting the pieces in wrong and didn’t take the time or effort to figure out why they didn’t fit. I’m planning on weather treating the wood soon and expect it to last years with proper maintenance. I highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap table
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold up on a covered deck. Not sturdy from day one. Top is poorly made. Cracked and warped wood. Stain faded (already lightly sanded and stained and sealed) Cheap metal legs which have faded too(spray painted). Overall, cheaply made table. I guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this table if I tried! I was looking for a “rustic” table to match my apartment and this had such a nice farmhouse feel to it. I did not expect it to be as gorgeous in person as it was. The table is absolutely BEAUTIFUL. I paired it with the matching bench and fabric charcoal dining seats and it looks so high end. I got a designer looking dining set that easily goes for $1600 as a set at most furniture stores for about 1/3rd of the price. Seriously look at the photo and see for yourself. I am in love with this as an indoor table. You won’t regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Flores

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This was the least expensive outdoor table I found. The wood is gorgeous and the planks are a generous thickness, the steel legs give the space an industrial vibe, it’s very well made and easy to put together, altogether perfect for our outdoor dining!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this would be a table we used for a couple years than replaced but my opinion changed when I pulled the table out of the box. This table is sturdy, beautiful, and high quality. We haven't had it long but it when you tough it you feel like it's good quality. We applied teak oil to it after a couple weeks to maintain the wood so we'll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great! The wood grain is nice, especially after getting another two coats of exterior tung oil (highly recommend for protection from rain and UV rays). The wood used on the tabletop is a bit thinner than is commonly seen on a table of this type, but given the price point, it’s fine if it’s not going to overloaded. I painted the legs white prior to assembly, but the factory black paint looked to be well done. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Stay Enough Good Things About This Table
customer_reviews.text: Although it is advertised as an outdoor table, I have opted to use it as my dining table and I couldn't be happier with it. Very easy to assemble: the table folds in half so it's just a matter of securing the legs and adding some reinforcing support. Some of the pictures lead me to believe that the table would be too narrow, but I find that it fits perfectly in my dining space.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Hafez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table, Great Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. The wood is beautiful, and it is extremely sturdy. It folds in half for shipping, but assembles into one very sturdy surface. Can't be folded for storage without disassembly, though. It was very well packed, and only took a few minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up well; fades
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this a 5 star but a year later it’s fading and not as sturdy. If you buy this you will have to stain it and keep up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect PC table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for what i needed. I wanted a PC triple monitor desk but did not like the options availible and the prices of some. I saw a review for this one from someone that used it as i wanted to. It is holding three 27" monitors, A large PC and two 25lb speakers. Bought it and it showed up two days later. It was very easy to setup but was folded in half. It is pretty sturdy and looks great in person. For the money you can't go wrong with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Crack in the veneer = bad warping after rain
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great and was easy to put together. However, ours had a tiny crack in the top veneer. After rainfall, it is warping badly in that spot. We have had the table for less than two weeks. Was certainly hoping for it to look good for longer than that!
customer_reviews.author: R Dabz

customer_reviews.title: Over a year later
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and used it for two summers on our front porch and left it on the porch, covered, over the winter. It has held up very well with little to no signs of use or aging. When I first received it I used some mineral oil on the wood that I had for a butcher block countertop in the kitchen but other than that it has been maintenance free.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Table is beautiful.. however it is Warping after only 4 weeks outside.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table as a Birthday gift for my husband in July. We were thrilled with it. Absolutely beautiful and sturdy. So nice, we were thinking maybe we should use it as an inside table. HOWEVER, it has only been outside for 4 weeks and it is already warping. Very disappointed. Something that is sold as outdoor furniture should last longer than a month outside. Sadly, I would not recommend this for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: This table is beautiful, especially for how inexpensive it is
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, especially for how inexpensive it is. I wasnt sure how the wood would hold up in the weather, so I applied two coats of polyurethane and I believe it will hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an affordable but stylish dining room table and this find made my day. For $190 you can’t beat it. I did order some hairpin style legs to replace the ones it came with to widen the gap on the ends and I think they’ll look better just personal preference tho. Love the table great find!
customer_reviews.author: skinton

customer_reviews.title: Great look, doesnt last
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table but the wood is already cracking. My guess is that it is due to sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Giannini

customer_reviews.title: NOT an outdoor table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as an outdoor table, as advertised. This table is less than three months old and is already cracking, chipping, and fading. Don’t waste your money. The wood bows as well. I am extremely disappointed and will never order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up in the cold but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Top image is what the table looked like after 12 months. We live in the midwest and it gets really cold in the winter so we kept the table covered in rain and during the long winter but when we removed the cover this spring the stain was pealing and the table was splintering. We sanded it, stained it and sealed it and it looks better than it originally did now. Hoping the seal helps it last this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wells

customer_reviews.title: great product, built well
customer_reviews.text: i love this table, metal legs are very useful. i just wash my backyard without thinking it will harm table, finish of table is perfect
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a good looking table
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table; I do plan to cover it with a polyurethane coat one of these days to lessen my paranoia about wet glasses on it; it’s a wood table after a. I also plan to cover it for the winter to protect it from the elements. Very happy with the look, quality and price point.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table with room for end chairs and benches on the sides
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price...Acacia wood with teak finish looks like a teak table with great presence under my outdoor pavilion with the benches I purchased. Great look for a a great price!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good but finish is not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's a good table for the money but make sure you cover it during rainy seasons. I live in the Seattle area so it took a beating this last winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Haas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. From the looks to the function it’s everything we wanted in an outdoor table.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table takes about 30 minutes to assemble but worth it. Love the wood.
customer_reviews.author: SHUDAD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.text: This was replace a metal & glass table and we were unsure of going for a solid wood replacement. Glad we did. Great product and at great price.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Measure space before ordering. Table is on smaller side but easily seats six using end chairs.
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Easy to assemble. I applied Teak oil to brighten wood tones. Low priced version of real teak tables that completely works for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Narrow but very nice materials and sturdy. Not all screws worked but did not affect function. I bought 2 and can make a square table or one long table.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Used some Old English wood oil and looks even better. Using it indoors instead of outdoors. *Metal legs are a dark brown color(not black)*. Assembly was easy and straightforward. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: juke owner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this table! Even after reading some of the reviews we took a chance and are so glad we did! After switching the two stabilizer pieces of wood the holes lined up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tejmc

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely wonderful. It's so solid and sturdy. The only thing missing is a hole for my umbrella but otherwise it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rider

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and great size. I have it inside, but putting it out this spring. Not great for 9ndoors because of slates betwern the wood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood table! I get so many compliments on it. All u have to do is put the legs on and done! Perfect size. I’m using it inside but could be used outside as well.
customer_reviews.author: bonnigale

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Steal of a table! We had searched and searched for a great outdoor table. Took a chance on this and is glad we did. It was very easy to assemble, took maybe 10 minutes. Looks great and is durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Weather Worn
customer_reviews.text: Looks great initially, but even with storage during the winter, the bench is very obviously worn from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Table
customer_reviews.text: I love my table! It looks expensive! It was pretty easy to assemble. My husband and I built it in about half hour. Directions were easy to follow. It’s very nice. Looks wonderful on our patio!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Holes for bolts were predrilled but a few didn't quite line up. Just pulling on the leg to get it to line up did the trick. Table looks really nice and seems like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: L8N

customer_reviews.title: Holes not drilled properly - defective. otherwise beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful but as other reviewers have posted, six holes are not drilled properly on one of the support posts, so the screws and bolts don't fit on that entire side. I still put the table together but worry it will not stay solid over time. I wish they would fix this issue because the table is really beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Table.M
customer_reviews.text: Makes a very good patio table. Easy to put together. Looks great, expected a metal top and was surprised that it was wood.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dischner

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, heavy, simple table! The wood is smooth but u can see the wood grain. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the overall price
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very sturdy and has held up well in many rainstorms over the month that we have it. We will see how it holds over time. The table is in direct sunlight and I do see some fading. My only complaint would be the size of the table. It’s pretty narrow, but definitely seats 6 adults comfortably. Overall great purchase for the price and I love the look of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, good for small family
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but smaller than anticipated. I would have liked a slightly bigger/wider table.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table! Only suggestion is for a hole for an umbrella option because I would’ve preferred that but as it’s wood might just cut one myself. Great value I think
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table although I think this seller bought the item from Lowe’s for and resold under the Christopher Knight name. The package arrived from Lowe’s and not Amazon
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Split After Just a Few Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, but it split in places after just a few weeks outside. This table should not be advertised for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: K.R

customer_reviews.title: It's Pretty, Stable, Real Wood...Nice Table!
customer_reviews.text: It's long, not too wide, stable, pretty...using inside, but will transition to covered patio later.
customer_reviews.author: MissBelle

customer_reviews.title: Just like the benches, the table is equally the bomb
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent table. Just love the design, functionality, and value. The engineering is great and the construction is sturdy. Great wood and stain job too. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fong

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great table
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the picture. Looks like very nice wood.
customer_reviews.author: catsnout

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use my table for indoor dining, and I absolutely love it. The color is beautiful even after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: DJaxxx

customer_reviews.title: Love My Table
customer_reviews.text: Used it for dining indoors. Love the industrial look. But heed the warnings. It dents and scratches easily. That's no fault of Christopher Knight. It is REAL acacia.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hess

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful. I have had several positive comments on this table from visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, easy to put together (very easy!), sturdy - nice surprise for the price. I put some station poly on it and it looks AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: This is a  beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It is beautiful and was quite easy to assemble if you just go sow and follow the directions. It is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Schussler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed an indoor table for extra seating at Easter. Ordered on Tuesday, received on Friday as promised! So easy to put together! The directions were actually clear & parts were clearly labeled. Took no time to assemble and looks great! Have bragged so much that other family members are going to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Whibbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best table ever!! For the price ! Excellent costumer service,
customer_reviews.author: Mario E Bonnet

customer_reviews.title: Quick to Assemble, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in about 35 minutes working alone. Nice, solid piece, with easy to follow instructions and extra parts. (Note, I bought the benches shown in my photo separately.)
customer_reviews.author: mwiesner

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor table
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table and very solid. I wanted a table that wasn’t metal or glass and this was ideal
customer_reviews.author: clu

customer_reviews.title: Great Table!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, easy assembly, to avoid any scratches directions add tips when assembling table (lay cloth or styrofoam under to prevent issues as it has to be turned upside down.) Beautiful wood, great indoors or out. Great price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RachTier

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bench, sturdy and good value for money. I purchased one, but decided to purchase the second to finish the look. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Anna Legenkaya

customer_reviews.title: Wood already cracking
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after I purchased it, the table is already developing cracks and fissures. I also have had to add another coat to seal it and make it water-resistant because it was absorbing water right after we bought it. I’m disappointed, because it really was such a pretty table and so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for outdoors. Less than a year later and it looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: This did not hold up in the outdoors. It was covered for several months in the winter and it still looks like it is 10 years old. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Casi Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Great table for money
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Have not had the chance to put teak oil on yet but water seems to run off pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Great table but narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Love the color, the wood is sturdy and durable and it looks great on our deck! The only issue is the table is pretty narrow in terms of width... trying to find chairs that can be pushed in at the heads of the table will be tricky because it’s only 20” wide in between the legs. Other than that, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph v

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: I did not have any of the problems with the support bar bolt holes lining up that were mentioned in earlier reviews.
customer_reviews.author: sc111

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Looks great and perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We really love this table and it looks fantastic. Would highly recommend. Real easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Sealed with teak oil and it’s holding up great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wooden surface and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! It looks even better than in pics advertised. On my deck. Absolutely love this table!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great value! Looks just as good as the expensive tables and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: molly biek

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Have had this table for 6 months and it is already garbage, the finish has come off, the boards are warped. Table is almost unusable at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our lanai in Florida. After putting legs on (very simple) I decided to apply tong oil and finish with some beeswax. While this is not required it really makes a difference in the appearance of the finish. Very stable, good looking table.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey B

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to opening this for assembly only to find the table itself damaged. Tried to repair with wood putty since very difficult to repackage for return, but still looks "repaired". Unfortunately am now 2 days past the Amazon return window. Unbox early and inspect it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table last year. Used it for 3 months and then it was stored, covered for for the winter. This is what it looked like when I uncovered it. I am so disappointed. It wasn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Milani A.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews I must say that this table looks like a much more expensive table than it actually is. It was easy to put together and it looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gradwell

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I oiled it and bought a cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I oiled it and bought a cover for it and am happy with it. Beautiful table
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: The finish on the table comes off immediately
customer_reviews.text: The table was the perfect size, easy to assemble and looked good for two months.
customer_reviews.author: P. Robb

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations for the cost, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This table was beyond our expectations, it’s very nice and a great quality and was easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hanshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good buy east to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This table is really sturdy. Easy to assemble and really pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! For the price I don’t think you could find anything better. I assembled it quickly and slid it out to our small lanai. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home 298192 Spanish Bay Acacia Wood Outdoor Dining Table | Perfect for Patio | with Teak Finis, Brown
product_meta.description: This Christopher Knight Home Della Rectangle Acacia Wood Dining Table is a great addition to any backyard. Its smooth lines are very flattering and dark iron legs add to the overall look. Combined with the acacia wood material, this table is great for all your outdoor needs. Great to use as a dining table or as a serving table, this Christopher Knight Home Della Rectangle Acacia Wood Dining Table does it all. A purchase you will enjoy for years to come.
feature_bullets: Dimensions (Overall): 29.25" H x 33" W | Floor to apron height: 26.5" | Tabletop Thickness: 3" | Weight: 55 lbs
